name: CYP2D6 inhibition can alter tramadol effect and tolerability

scenario.notes: Reference scenario: CYP2D6 inhibitor with tramadol (CYP2D6 involvement).

actions: Monitor for reduced analgesic response and/or increased adverse effects depending on patient-specific factors (educational).

rationale: CYP2D6 contributes to tramadol metabolism and active metabolite formation.
Inhibition may change tramadol response and tolerability.

explanation_template: {B_name} inhibits CYP2D6 and tramadol has CYP2D6-dependent metabolism. This may alter tramadol response (including reduced activation) and change adverse effect risk.

references.citation: CYP2D6 inhibition can meaningfully affect drugs with CYP2D6-dependent clearance or activation; tramadol is commonly cited in teaching examples.
